description.en:
MDC is an ecosystem platform based on beauty information on social networking services.
Our goal are to :
1. Construct platform that shares beauty information
2. Manage a live e-commerce platform mainly about cosmetics and beauty
3. Operate and online mall that trade beauty service and cosmetic products
4. Create a Smart Mirror specialized in beauty and cosmetics
5. Create a Blockchain-based supply chain management solution of domestic cosmetics material
